product_name: SmartWool Hiking Ultralight Mini Socks - Women's
long_description: There's nothing better than summer hikes-and when you don the SmartWool Hiking Ultralight Mini socks, you can expect them to be even more spectacular! Ultralight cushioning offers just enough to pad your feet without being too warm or bulky; these are designed specifically to fit well with light and short-height hiking boots. WOW (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the soles, improving durability and overall comfort. Mesh venting in the top of the feet keeps them cool; elasticized arch braces and multiribbed cuffs provide keep socks in place. Flat knit toe seams prevent irritation for enhanced comfort. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: There's nothing better than summer hikes-and when you don the SmartWool Hiking Ultralight Mini socks, you can expect them to be even more spectacular!
